channel.title: Project_posts on Morris-Frank
channel.description: Recent content in Project_posts on Morris-Frank

item.title: ruDALL-e
item.description: Bored Ape Yacht Club - Initial weights: Malevich - Learning rate: 5e-6 or 1e-6 - Training amount: 1 epoch - Dataset: The 10_000 apes from their website, paired with their description. As those stupid apes are fairly similar, getting the right learning rate is important at 1e-5 the model basically collapses on the mean monkey (no accessoiraces, brown background). 1e-6 gives fairly unconstrained results (less monkey-y), 5e-6 contrains strongly on the monkey shape but allows stuff to happen.

item.title: Still in motion
item.description: I am really in love with an app made @ Google Research called MotionStills. It takes little videos that can be stabilized with some quite involved CV algorithm it seems… And the app is super slim… I assume Google will kill it in the future but until then it is super fun to use. 2022 2021 2020 2019 2018
